page.title: 08CLUBS AND COMMITTEES 2
page.content: WOMEN'S RURAL INSTITUTE-active in Culross for 56 yrs. Now 25 members aged 25+yrs. Monthly meetings - speakers-subjects like: police force, fire service, drugs, first-aid; demonstrations of cookery, sewing, etc. Raise money for charities. CULROSS COMMUNITY COUNCIL-Basically looking after the interests of the Community in most matters that are not dealt with by the Police or any other authority. FESTIVAL COMMITTEE formed 2 yrs. ago to promote music to suit all tastes. Would like,eventually,to run a short festival as an extention of Gala Week. YOUTH CLUB-started 1969.16 unpaid Committee Members,2 Paid,organise out- door and in-door sports, discos, competitions,etc.,for 5-8,8-13,13-16 year olds.
